definition: to hope for/to long for/to expect

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

glancing to left and right (idiom); to look all around

sentences.english: Ihope I didn't wake you up so early.
sentences.chinese: 我盼願這麼早沒有吵到你。

sentences.english: I’m looking at scripts and auditioning.
sentences.chinese: 我也盼着其它的好劇本和試演機會。

sentences.english: We’re all looking forward to more visitors coming.
sentences.chinese: 我們所有人都盼着能多來點遊客。

sentences.english: The eagerly await its arrival and always ask when she and her dog will be back.
sentences.chinese: 這些老人們盼着狗狗地到來，並當她帶起狗時很留戀。

sentences.english: See you soon, lots of luv , Sue.
sentences.chinese: 盼早日見到你，非常愛你的，休。

sentences.english: A saturating rain was expected to end the drought.
sentences.chinese: 只盼下場透雨，解除旱情。

sentences.english: The child dreamed of nothing but going to the zoo.
sentences.chinese: 這孩子就是盼着要到動物園去玩。

sentences.english: Waiting for you, from beginning till now, it is still impossible.
sentences.chinese: 爲你等，從一開始盼到現在，也同樣落的不可能。

sentences.english: Reclaim Nature's Blessings, Through BN's Products.
sentences.chinese: 盼藉著拜恩的產品，重享大自然的福分。

sentences.english: Cryin'in the night, the night goes in to.
sentences.chinese: 我在暗夜中哭泣，盼不到白晝的來臨。

sentences.english: Those people wait all year and you want to give them this dishwater .
sentences.chinese: 全國上下盼了一整年，你難道就給他們喝洗碗水。

sentences.english: China's prosperity day hope, concerted efforts must be achieved.
sentences.chinese: 中國強盛日日盼，衆志成城必實現。

sentences.english: Forget me not, never let me wait till whitened all.
sentences.chinese: 勿忘我，別叫我，盼到白首。

sentences.english: Zheng Wanyi sincerely look forward to her daughter in full bloom less hardship, get married soon.
sentences.chinese: 鄭婉頤真心盼着女兒盛開少喫苦，早日嫁出去。

sentences.english: We look forward to receiving your inquiry at an early date.
Britons want William, not Charles as next king.
sentences.chinese: 英逾六成民衆盼威廉王子直接繼位。
